description: Number of equivalence classes of n X n binary matrices when one can permute rows, permute columns and complement columns.
references: M. A. Harrison, On the number of classes of binary matrices, IEEE Trans. Computers, 22 (1973), 1048-1051.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Index entries for sequences related to binary matrices
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Definition corrected by Brendan McKay, Jan 07 2007.
Terms a(7) onward from _Max Alekseyev_, Feb 05 2010
